pageTitle: Dawn of Darkness tops this week’s emerging Facebook games | SocialTimes
textBeforeTable: Two other games this week saw traffic increases greater than 100 percent. Skylance Llc’s Aquantika – Aquarium 3D brought in 11,000 MAU for a 122 percent gain. Peak Games’ Pool Plus snagged 10,000 MAU, a 100 percent increase. Vostu’s Find & Climb took the No. 2 spot, also up by 40,000 MAU for a 400 percent gain. Take. Music Quizzes’ Top Loves increased by 23,000 MAU, a 329 percent increase that secured the No. 3 position. Olsen Bro Gaming’s Combat Extreme came in at No. 4 with 20,000 MAU, a 50 percent increase. Soccer sim Galatasaray Fantasy Manager took No. 5 with 20,000 MAU, another 50 percent increase. IGG’s Dawn of Darkness (PH) took the No. 1 spot among this week’s emerging Facebook games, up 400 percent with 40,000 monthly active users. This game appears to be a regional version of the original Dawn of Darkness, but featured English-language text when we loaded it; perhaps it’s the version launched in the Philippines. By Mike Thompson on Dec. 14, 2012 - 12:00 PMComment SHARES
textAfterTable: All data in this post comes from our traffic tracking service, AppData. Come back next week for our top weekly gainers by monthly active users on Monday, our daily active users on Wednesday, and the top emerging apps on Friday. < Previous Article Next Article > Advertisement Please enable JavaScript to view the comments powered by Disqus.
